Developer CV Pro example

by Milos Rujevic — on try , job search , json to html , json to pdf 10 Apr 2015

Use something fancy to make your CV

I would suggest you to use this FANCY thing here

If you are still reading this the odds are you have not clicked on the this FANCY thing here

So, let me tell you about it.. Fancy thing is actually json_resume it will get your resume translated from JSON to HTML (with templates), markdown, and etc..

json_resume is written in ruby and that is why I decided to try it.

This library gives you number of posibilities for file version of your resume:

  • create HTML
  • create Markdown
  • create LaTex
  • create PDF from HTML
  • create PDF from LaTex
  • create Markdown version

Support for foreign languages (i18n Support)

Currently supports:

  • English (en)
  • Spanish (es)
  • Finnish (fi)
  • Portuguese (pt)

Here is json example needed for json_resume

Here you can see final results in html

Here you can see final results in pdf

or if you don’t care about anything, you can always turn to TheEelevantResume
